ViewObject.Name: UtUserRoleValidationNonFoodArea
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM, :usrName AS CUR_USER, (SELECT AST.STEP_SEQUENCE FROM APPROVAL_STEPS AST WHERE AST.ID_APRVL_FLOW = ApprovalFlow.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND AST.ROLE_NAME = :usrRole) AS CUR_SEQ, AppUserAccess.USER_NAME AS SPV_USR_NM, (SELECT AST.STEP_SEQUENCE FROM APPROVAL_STEPS AST, FCS_UN_USER_ACCESS_ROLES UAR WHERE AST.ID_APRVL_FLOW = ApprovalFlow.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND AST.ROLE_NAME = UAR.ROLE AND UAR.USER_NAME = AppUserAccess.USER_NAME) AS SPV_USR_SEQ, (SELECT MAX(AST.STEP_SEQUENCE) FROM APPROVAL_STEPS AST WHERE AST.ID_APRVL_FLOW = ApprovalFlow.ID_APRVL_FLOW) AS LAST_SEQ FROM FCS_UN_USER_ACCESS AppUserAccess, FCS_UN_USER_ACCESS_ROLES AppUserAccessRoles, APPROVAL_FLOW ApprovalFlow, APPROVAL_STEPS ApprovalSteps, APP_ROLES AppRoles WHERE AppUserAccess.COMPANY_ID = :compId AND AppUserAccessRoles.USER_NAME = AppUserAccess.USER_NAME AND ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM = 'PROPOSAL NON FOOD' AND ApprovalSteps.ID_APRVL_FLOW = ApprovalFlow.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND AppUserAccessRoles.ROLE = ApprovalSteps.ROLE_NAME AND AppRoles.NAME = AppUserAccessRoles.ROLE AND AppUserAccess.USER_NAME = :spvUsrNm AND ApprovalSteps.STEP_SEQUENCE > (SELECT ASTEP.STEP_SEQUENCE FROM APPROVAL_FLOW AFLOW, APPROVAL_STEPS ASTEP, FCS_UN_USER_ACCESS_ROLES UAR WHERE AFLOW.APRVL_FLOW_NM = ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM AND ASTEP.ID_APRVL_FLOW = AFLOW.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND ASTEP.ROLE_NAME = UAR.ROLE AND UAR.USER_NAME = :usrName) UNION ALL SELECT ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM, :usrName AS CUR_USER, (SELECT AST.STEP_SEQUENCE FROM APPROVAL_STEPS AST WHERE AST.ID_APRVL_FLOW = ApprovalFlow.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND AST.ROLE_NAME = :usrRole) AS CUR_SEQ, AppUserAccess.USER_NAME AS SPV_USR_NM, (SELECT AST.STEP_SEQUENCE FROM APPROVAL_STEPS AST, FCS_UN_USER_ACCESS_ROLES UAR WHERE AST.ID_APRVL_FLOW = ApprovalFlow.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND AST.ROLE_NAME = UAR.ROLE AND UAR.USER_NAME = AppUserAccess.USER_NAME) AS SPV_USR_SEQ, (SELECT MAX(AST.STEP_SEQUENCE) FROM APPROVAL_STEPS AST WHERE AST.ID_APRVL_FLOW = ApprovalFlow.ID_APRVL_FLOW) AS LAST_SEQ FROM FCS_UN_USER_ACCESS AppUserAccess, FCS_UN_USER_ACCESS_ROLES AppUserAccessRoles, APPROVAL_FLOW ApprovalFlow, APPROVAL_STEPS ApprovalSteps, APP_ROLES AppRoles WHERE AppUserAccess.COMPANY_ID = :compId AND AppUserAccessRoles.USER_NAME = AppUserAccess.USER_NAME AND ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM = 'PROPOSAL NON FOOD' AND ApprovalSteps.ID_APRVL_FLOW = ApprovalFlow.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND AppUserAccessRoles.ROLE = ApprovalSteps.ROLE_NAME AND AppRoles.NAME = AppUserAccessRoles.ROLE AND AppUserAccess.USER_NAME = :usrName AND (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM FCS_UN_USER_ACCESS AppUserAccess, FCS_UN_USER_ACCESS_ROLES AppUserAccessRoles, APPROVAL_FLOW ApprovalFlow, APPROVAL_STEPS ApprovalSteps, APP_ROLES AppRoles WHERE AppUserAccess.COMPANY_ID = :compId AND AppUserAccessRoles.USER_NAME = AppUserAccess.USER_NAME AND ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM = 'PROPOSAL NON FOOD' AND ApprovalSteps.ID_APRVL_FLOW = ApprovalFlow.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND AppUserAccessRoles.ROLE = ApprovalSteps.ROLE_NAME AND AppRoles.NAME = AppUserAccessRoles.ROLE AND AppUserAccess.USER_NAME = :spvUsrNm AND ApprovalSteps.STEP_SEQUENCE > (SELECT ASTEP.STEP_SEQUENCE FROM APPROVAL_FLOW AFLOW, APPROVAL_STEPS ASTEP, FCS_UN_USER_ACCESS_ROLES UAR WHERE AFLOW.APRVL_FLOW_NM = ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM AND ASTEP.ID_APRVL_FLOW = AFLOW.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND ASTEP.ROLE_NAME = UAR.ROLE AND UAR.USER_NAME = :usrName)) = 0
